EmailTemplate.description: Friendly Reminder of registration sent to all attendees
EmailTemplate.name: Return of Title IV Funds Webex Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Courtesy Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a friendly reminder of your registration for an IEFC & ASA training event
You've been registered for the Return of Title IV Funds Webex.
Date: 12/12/07 Time: 10:00am -11:00am EST Location: Webex
Directions to logon:
To join the online meeting ------------------------------------------------------- 1. Go to https://amsa.webex.com/amsa/onstage/g.php?d=486542504&t=a 2. Enter your name and email address. 3. Enter the meeting password: regupdate1 4. Click "Join Now". 5. Follow the instructions that appear on your screen.
------------------------------------------------------- To join the teleconference only ------------------------------------------------------- 1-866-279-4742 Access Code:7284655 1-309-229-0118 Access Code 7284655 ------------------------------------------------------- For assistance ------------------------------------------------------- 1. Go to https://amsa.webex.com/amsa/mc 2. On the left navigation bar, click "Support".
If you have never signed in to our webex before please allow 5-10 minutes to login.
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your training registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
Other Information All of ASA's training programs are offered free of charge. Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions about our training program.
